Text: Based on geography, China and Japan countries hold major share in automotive exhaust system market owing to growth in volume of sale of passenger vehicles in the countries. USA and EU are expected to showcase a substantial growth rate over the forecast time frame due to stringent regulations regarding emissions. The global market is expected to grow at a CAGR of approximately 4.6% over the next five years, will reach US $46100 million in 2024, from US $35200 million in 2019.
Cause: Based on geography, China and Japan countries hold major share in automotive exhaust system market owing to growth in volume of sale of passenger vehicles in the countries.
Effect: The global market is expected to grow at a CAGR of approximately 4.6% over the next five years, will reach US $46100 million in 2024, from US $35200 million in 2019.
